title: Myra-The Simple Wish
description: Myraâ€™s life of slavery concludes as she discovers brothers they may be, but all men are not created in the same mold. However peace is not hers to grasp, as her former cruel Master refuses to rescind his ownership, and becomes increasingly desperate to have her returned to his tyranny. She must fight just one more time to be granted her simple wish
author: Myra Zhivanevskaya
